channel.title: StoicallyTyped
channel.description: Posts on Android, Kotlin, and internet privacy along with other tech and life topics.

item.title: Android Emulators vs Bluetooth Headphones
item.description: How to Fix Poor Audio Quality When Using Android Emulators
item.dc:creator: Matt McKenna

item.title: Learning Live Templates for Jetpack Compose
item.description: What are Live Templates? How can they speed up your development? And how to create your own for Jetpack Compose!
item.dc:creator: Matt McKenna

item.title: Adding comments via Utteranc.es
item.description: GitHub Issue powered comments are now available on all posts!
item.dc:creator: Matt McKenna

item.title: Newsletter Announcement
item.description: Your weekly dose of bite sized Android news and events delivered Monday mornings to kick off your week.
item.dc:creator: Matt McKenna

item.title: Effective Naming of Booleans
item.description: Name your booleans in an effective way that is easy to understand and code review.
item.dc:creator: Matt McKenna

item.title: Contributing to the #KotlinPhotoContest
item.description: Recently @mreichelt on Twitter had the great idea to create some free-to-use images of Kotlin for the community. These are my submissions!
item.dc:creator: Matt McKenna

item.title: Magically turn your phone into a tablet with adb for testing tablet views!
item.description: Learn how to use adb to change a phone's screen size and density to render tablet views.
item.dc:creator: Matt McKenna

item.title: Hello, World!
item.description: This is the start of my blogging journey!
